message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. I take $6,000, you take $4,000. A good deal for both of us in the first round!
I think we can do a little better.  This accounts for the devaluation in the next round if you decline.
Bob, let's be reasonable. I'll take a slight hit from my last offer, $5,500. You get $4,500, which is better than what you'll get if you decline again!
Alice, this is getting silly.  Let's just split it evenly and call it a day.  Any more rounds and we'll both lose out significantly.
